item.description:
A recent Masters graduate of computer from the University of Regina with several years of experience in software development and programming in general. Experienced with provisioning, building and deploying in the cloud environment(Both Azure and AWS Certified). I am well informed with most recent/trending technologies in various aspects of computing, especially in the UX/UI design, frontend technologies and frameworks, RESTful API convensions and methods etc. I have hands-on experience writing applications with Java, Reactjs, python/Django.

Relevant Courses: Software Development Principles, Humman Computer Communication, Data Analysis From the Internate, Artificial Intelligence, Information Visualization
